p: The specific mechanism takes into account the immunological properties of the vaccine. The protective effect of the influenza vaccine has been demonstrated in multiple studies. To explain the pleiotropic effect of the influenza vaccine, the “antigen mimicry” between atherothrombotic plaque and influenza virus has been proposed [ 22]. It has also been proposed that there is an autoimmune “cross-reaction” between influenza and atherosclerosis [ 13] [ 44].
